job_description:
Job Title: Technical Consultant for IBM Products for AI and Data

Summary:

We are seeking a highly skilled Technical Consultant with a strong background in AI and data to join our team. As a Technical Consultant, you will work closely with clients to understand their business requirements and develop tailored solutions using IBM products. You will have the opportunity to work on a wide range of projects, from proof-of-concepts to full-scale implementations, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional results.

Responsibilities:

* Provide pre-sales consulting services to clients, including understanding business requirements, developing proof-of-concepts, and presenting solutions to clients
* Work closely with clients to understand their business needs and develop tailored solutions using IBM products for AI and data
* Develop and deliver presentations, demos, and proof-of-concepts to clients to showcase the value of IBM products
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including sales, marketing, and product development, to deliver exceptional results
* Stay up-to-date with the latest developments in AI and data, including new technologies and trends
* Develop and maintain a deep understanding of IBM products for AI and data, including their features, benefits, and applications
* Provide technical guidance and support to clients, including troubleshooting and resolving technical issues
* Develop and deliver training and enablement programs for clients and internal stakeholders

Required Skills:

* 4+ years of experience in a technical consulting role, preferably in the AI and data space
* Strong background in pre-sales consulting, client-facing skills, and explaining complex technical solutions to non-technical stakeholders
* Experience with AI/ML and Python programming, including development and deployment of models
* Strong understanding of SQL databases and development capabilities
* Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills
* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and prioritize multiple projects simultaneously
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively

Preferred Qualifications:

* Experience with IBM products for AI and data, including Watson Studio, Watson Assistant, and Cloud Pak for Data
* Experience with cloud-based technologies, including AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud
* Experience with agile development methodologies and version control systems, such as Git
* Certification in AI, data science, or a related field

Experience Range: 4+ years

Job Location: Remote

Job Title: AI Engineer
Summary:
We are seeking an experienced AI Engineer to join our team in Chennai. The successful candidate will have a strong background in artificial intelligence and machine learning, with a focus on developing and deploying AI models that drive business value. The ideal candidate will have a passion for innovation, a strong work ethic, and excellent communication skills.
Responsibilities:
* Design, develop, and deploy AI models that meet business requirements
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing products and services
* Develop and maintain large-scale AI systems, including data pipelines and model deployment
* Work with stakeholders to identify business problems and develop AI solutions to address them
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends and advancements in AI and machine learning
* Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to develop and deploy AI models
* Develop and maintain technical documentation for AI systems
* Troubleshoot and debug AI systems as needed
Required Skills:
* 4+ years of experience in AI and machine learning
* Strong background in computer science, mathematics, or a related field
* Experience with AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Keras
* Experience with programming languages such as Python, Java, or C++
* Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms and techniques
* Experience with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation
* Strong understanding of software development principles and practices
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Preferred Qualifications:
* Experience with cloud-based AI platforms such as AWS SageMaker, Google Cloud AI Platform, or Azure Machine Learning
* Experience with containerization using Docker
* Experience with agile development methodologies
* Strong understanding of data privacy and security principles
Experience Range: 4-6 years
Job Location: Chennai

Job Title: Python Developer
Location: Mumbai
Job Type: Full-time
About Us:
We are a leading technology company based in Mumbai, specializing in cloud-based solutions and DevOps practices. We are seeking an experienced Python Developer to join our team, who can design, develop, and deploy scalable and efficient software systems.
Job Summary:
We are looking for a skilled Python Developer with 5 years of experience to work on our cloud-based projects. The ideal candidate should have a strong proficiency in Python programming language, cloud technologies (AWS/Azure/GCP), and DevOps practices (CI/CD, containerization, etc.). The candidate should be able to design, develop, and deploy scalable and efficient software systems, and collaborate with our team of engineers to deliver high-quality solutions.
Responsibilities:
* Design, develop, and deploy scalable and efficient software systems using Python programming language
* Work on cloud-based projects using AWS/Azure/GCP, and ensure seamless integration with our existing infrastructure
* Collaborate with our team of engineers to deliver high-quality solutions, and participate in code reviews and pair programming
* Implement DevOps practices such as CI/CD, containerization (Docker), and orchestration (Kubernetes)
* Troubleshoot and debug issues, and ensure timely resolution of production issues
* Participate in agile development methodologies, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends, and apply knowledge of new technologies and tools to improve our software systems
Requirements:
* 5 years of experience in Python programming language, with a strong understanding of object-oriented programming concepts
* Proficiency in cloud technologies (AWS/Azure/GCP), and experience with cloud-based projects
* Experience with DevOps practices such as CI/CD, containerization (Docker), and orchestration (Kubernetes)
* Strong understanding of software development life cycle, and experience with agile development methodologies
* Excellent problem-solving skills, and ability to troubleshoot and debug issues
* Strong communication and collaboration skills, with ability to work with cross-functional teams
* Bachelor

Job Title: Java Developer

Summary:

We are seeking an experienced Java Developer to join our team in Mumbai. The successful candidate will have a strong background in Java development and a minimum of 4 years of experience in the field. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of Java programming language, Java frameworks, and databases. The candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and testing Java-based applications, as well as collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements.

Responsibilities:

* Design, develop, and test Java-based applications
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements
* Participate in code reviews and ensure that all solutions are aligned with the company
